Library.description: This service contains the operation related to generating Control Plan Norm document from the Control Plan structure.
Library.name: Acp0SoaControlPlanAW

ParameterInfo.description: Input structure for creating and updating Rule Conditions.

Operation.description: This operation creates and updates RuleConditions (Acp0RuleConditions) by parsing the given input expression.
Operation.name: createUpdateRuleConditions
Operation.returnDescription:
Rule (Acp0Rule) and Rule Conditions (Acp0RuleConditons) are returned in the response. Following error codes are returned in the response.
•    420006     Rule expression is empty.
•    420007     Input Rule is not of valid type.
•    420008    Naming Convention is not provided
•    420009    Naming convention is Invalid.
•    420010    Operation string provided as input is not valid.
•    420011    Rule status string provided as input is not valid.
•    420012    Input Rule Conditions are not of valid type.
Operation.useCase:
User has created the Rule with following conditions using Active workspace UI
Condition: If(( Pmi.Nominal_value > 10 & Pmi.LowerTolerance <= 0.1 ) || Pmi.Context = Critical )
Condition objects will get created for every condition by storing the expression in prefix format for CLIPS evaluation.
Expression: If(( Pmi.Nominal_value > 0 & pmi.Tolerance < 10 ) || pmi.Context == Criticality )

Index             Expression[]                                                                                                             Evaluation Result
0             Pmi.Nominal_value > 0 & Pmi.Tolerance >10 ||Pmi.context == Criticality    
1             > PMI.Nominal_value 0                                                                                                     true
2             > Pmi.Tolerance 10                                                                                                                false
3             &@1@2                                                                                                                                    true & false = false
4         == Pmi.Context Criticality                                                                                        true
5             || @3@4                                                                                                                                    true

ParameterInfo.description: Input structure for generating control plan report (HTML Dataset) created from the Control Plan.

Operation.description: This operation creates Control Plan norm document from the Control Plan structure, also this operation creates Dataset from the Control Plan document and relates this Dataset to Control Plan Object.
Operation.name: generateControlPlanNormDoc
Operation.returnDescription:
A html Dataset created from generated report. Following error codes are returned in the response.
•    420001 The Context object is not a Control Plan object.
•    420002 The Input Report Definition is not a Control Plan object.
•    420003 The report definition is empty.
•    420004 The report criteria values for BOM Report and Revision Rule are missing.
•    420005 Report option values for Report locale and RunAsync are missing.
•    420006 The dataset name is empty.
Operation.useCase:
1.    User creates Control Plan structure in Active workspace as below
Control Plan
    |__Inspection Operation
         |__Characteristics Representation <=> Characteristics Specification (Nominal Value = 10.000, Upper Tolerance =0.01, Lower Tolerance = -0.01)
2.    User selects Control Plan in Active Workspace and on click of “Print” command the new operation generates the HTML document for Control Plan.
3.    Properties of Control Plan (Cip0ControlPlanRevision), Inspection Operation (MEOperation), Characteristics Represenation (Aqc0CharElementRevision), and
Characteristics Specification (Qc0CharSpecification) used to create Control Plan norm document.
4.     Using report definition for Control Plan (Cip0ControlPlanRevision) Control Plan Norm document gets created.

ParameterInfo.description: A list of input of ImportPMIInControlPlanStructInput structure which contains Characteristics information data with BCT characteristic UID.

Context object - Control Plan (Cip0ControlPlanRevision) or Operation(MEOPRevision). For associating the Part which has selected balloon or characteristics information and link the created Inspection Definition as a child of context object.
Map (businessObject, string) of Inspection Definition (Aqc0CharElement) and ipxml file paths.

Operation.description: This Operation creates or searches the Characteristics (Qc0VariableCharSpec) based on Naming Convention (Acp0NamingConvention), Inspection definition (Aqc0CharElement) as a child of Control Plan or Operation and PMI Object (Mci0PMI) as a child of Inspection Definition (Aqc0CharElement).
Operation.name: importPMIInControlPlanStruct
Operation.returnDescription:
All created objects Characteristics (Qc0VariableCharSpec), Inspection Definition (Aqc0CharElement), PMI (Mci0PMI) are returned in the response. Following error codes are returned in the response.
•    420101 Input Context Object must be Control Plan or Operation.
•    420102 Input BCT Characteristics UID is empty.
•    420103 BCT services are offline or please check the network access.
•    420104 BCT service does not return the IPXML file.
•    420105 Import PMI failed.
•    420106 Association of Part and context Object(Control Plan/Operation) is failed.
•    420107 Input ipxml file path is not valid.
•    420108 Input Inspection Definition is not of valid type.
Operation.useCase:
In Context of Control Plan: -
User is in Control plan structure on CAD View Tab (Active workspace UI) which has part design rendered with balloon and characteristics info.
                    - User selects the balloon/characteristic info row on part drawing and click import
                     PMI command for creating the PMI objects.
                             -Structural object creations in backend
                                    1. This service operation creates or search characteristics group
                                         (Qc0CharacteristicsGroup) based on Naming Convention
                                         (Acp0NamingConvention). Under created or searched characteristics
                                        Group operation will create or search the characteristics
                                        (Qc0VariableCharSpec).
                                    2. Create or Revise Inspection definition (Aqc0CharElement) as a child
                                        of Control plan and associate to Characteristics.
                                    3. This operation will create PMI (Mci0PMI) object as a child of
                                         Inspection Definition (Aqc0CharElement).
                
                 - Structural Representation :-
                         ControlPlan
                                     | __ Inspection Definition
                                                                 | __ PMI

In Context of Operation:-
User is in Control plan structure and context of operation on CAD View Tab(Active workspace UI) which has part design rendered with balloon and characteristics info.
    - User selects the balloon/characteristic info row on part drawing and click import PMI
     command for creating the PMI objects.
                             -Structural object creations in backend
                                    1. This service operation creates or search characteristics
                                         group (Qc0CharacteristicsGroup) based on
                                         Naming Convention (Acp0NamingConvention Under created or
                                         Searched Characteristics Group operation will create or search the
                                         Characteristics (Qc0VariableCharSpec).
                                    2. Create or Revise the Inspection definition
                                        (Aqc0CharElement) as a child of Operation and associate to
                                        Characteristics.
                                    3. This operation will create PMI (Mci0PMI) object as a child of
                                         Inspection Definition (Aqc0CharElement).
                    -Structural Representation: -
                                 Control Plan
                                             | __ Operation
                                                             | __ Inspection Definition
                                                                                     | __ PMI

ServiceInterface.description: This service contains the operation related to generating Control Plan Norm document from the Control Plan structure.
ServiceInterface.name: ControlPlanManagement

ServiceInterface.description:
This service contains the operation related to creation of Characteristics (Qc0VariableCharSpec), Inspection Definition (Aqc0CharElement) and PMI (Mci0PMI) from selected balloon or characteristics from CAD drawing of part and associate respective part to the Operation (MEOPRevision) and Control plan (Cip0ControlPlanRevision
).
ServiceInterface.name: ControlPlanPmiImport

ServiceInterface.description: This service contains the operation related to Characteristics Rule Engine like parsing the expression to create the rule conditions. Create Inspection Definition and Characteristics Specification from the selected characteristics from CAD drawing.
ServiceInterface.name: RuleEngine

StructElement.description: Source class represents the name of the class whose attributes are used for creating rule condition (Acp0RuleCondition). Currently the class used is  Mci0Pmi (Product Manufacturing Information). Currently this LOV will have only one value as Mci0Pmi but in future multiple classes will be supported.
StructElement.name: sourceClass

StructElement.description: Default Naming Convention to be used when none of the condition satisfies from the associated naming convention. This value is generated by the user through AW UI and stored in Database.
StructElement.name: defaultNamingConvention

StructElement.description:
Status of the Rule (Active or Inactive). Only active rule will be evaluated.
Active : Only Active Rule will be used for condition evaluation.
Inactive : Inactive rules does not take part in condition evaluation.
StructElement.name: ruleStatus

StructElement.description:
The operation (Create/Update) to apply to the Rule and Conditions.
Create : Creates conditions (Acp0RuleConditions) for given Rule.
Update : Updates conditions (Acp0RuleConditions) for given Rule.
StructElement.name: operation

StructElement.description: Rule (Acp0Rule) to be updated.
StructElement.name: rule

StructElement.description: A list of input for creating Rule conditions (Acp0RuleConditions).

StructElement.name: namingConvention

StructElement.description: Expression for  updating Rule (Acp0Rule) and associated Conditions (Acp0RuleConditions).
StructElement.name: expression

Struct.description:
Input structure for generating control plan report (HTML Dataset) created from the
Control Plan.

Structure Elements:
•    contextObject    Input context object. Only Cip0ControlPlanRevision are supported.
•    reportDefinitionObject    Report Definition.
•    reportName    Name of the report.
•    datasetName    Name to be given to html dataset that gets created.
•    criteriaValuesMap    A map (string, string) of parameters and values used for the report generation.
Criteria keys = {"BOM_REPORT", “REV_RULE", "VARIANT_RULE "}
Criteria values = {"TRUE", "<REV RULE NAME>", "<VARIANT RULE NAME>", "<TRUE/FALSE>"}
BOM_REPORT – It is flag indicating to process a structure and export format. If true PLMXML export format is used.This is required value.
REV_RULE – Revision Rule name used to configure the structure.This is required value.
VARIANT_RULE – Variant Rule UID used to configure structure.This value is not required now. Its for future extension.
•    reportOptionMap    A map (string, string) used to passs information like if the report is async and what locale to use for generation.Both option key are required.
option keys = { REPORT_LOCALE, RUNASYNC }
option values = { EN_US, FALSE}
REPORT_LOCALE – Locale to use for report generation.
RUNASYNC – Used to specify if the report needed is Sync or Async.
Struct.name: ReportGenerationInput

StructElement.description: HTML Dataset created from html document generated from the Control Plan
StructElement.name: dataset

StructElement.description: Contains any exceptions that occurred while performing the operation.
StructElement.name: serviceData

Struct.description:
Output contains a HTML Datatset created from report generated from the control plan structure . Service data is populated with any exceptions that occurred while performing the operation.
Structure Elements:
•    dataset    HTML Dataset created from html document generated from the Control Plan
•    serviceData    Contains any exceptions that occurred while performing the operation.
Struct.name: ReportGenerationResponse
